name: Grounded!
description:
Feed HOLEY the hole in the basemt your toys, without letting your mother catching you "playing" with your toys ! or you will be grounded !  

This game was made for "Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1" Themed "Hole".

credit:

made with Unity .

all the art (Sprites / animation) made with Piskel by me.
